name: Access Service Group
title: ASG
definition: Identifies the access service group assigned to a particular circuit or group of circuits.
fieldNotes: This number appears on the Customer Service Record (the billing service charge details) which was forwarded to the customer when the service was installed, or, when there was a change to the bill resulting from service order activity.  The ASG may also be provided on the Confirmation Notice Form (CN) by the provider.
If a new ASG is being requested then the only valid entry is “N”.
